# iosxr_srlg (Resource)

This resource can manage the SRLG configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_srlg" "example" {
  names = [
    {
      srlg_name   = "SRLG1"
      value       = 100
      description = "SRLG for critical links"
    }
  ]
  interfaces = [
    {
      interface_name           = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
      include_optical          = true
      include_optical_priority = "critical"
      indexes = [
        {
          index_number = 1
          value        = 300
          priority     = "critical"
        }
      ]
      names = [
        {
          srlg_name = "INTF-SRLG1"
        }
      ]
      groups = [
        {
          index_number = 1
          group_name   = "INTF-GROUP1"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
  groups = [
    {
      group_name = "GROUP1"
      indexes = [
        {
          index_number = 1
          value        = 200
          priority     = "critical"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `groups` (Attributes List) SRLG group configuration submode (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))
- `inherit_locations` (Attributes List) SRLG inherit-location configuration submode (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--inherit_locations))
- `interfaces` (Attributes List) SRLG interface configuration submode (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces))
- `names` (Attributes List) SRLG name to value mapping (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--names))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

### Nested Schema for `groups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) SRLG group configuration submode

Optional:

- `indexes` (Attributes List) Index number for this value (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups--indexes))

<a id="nestedatt--groups--indexes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups.indexes`

Required:

- `index_number` (Number) Index number for this value
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `priority` (String) Set prority for the value
  - Choices: `critical`, `default`, `high`, `low`, `verylow`
- `value` (Number) Configure SRLG network value
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`

- `location_name` (String) The inherit location name

Optional:

- `indexes` (Attributes List) Index number for this value (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--inherit_locations--indexes))

### Nested Schema for `inherit_locations.indexes`

Required:

- `index_number` (Number) Index number for this value
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `priority` (String) Set prority for the value
  - Choices: `critical`, `default`, `high`, `low`, `verylow`
- `value` (Number) Configure SRLG network value
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`



<a id="nestedatt--interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces`

Required:

- `interface_name` (String) SRLG interface configuration submode

Optional:

- `groups` (Attributes List) Group index number for this entry (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces--groups))
- `include_optical` (Boolean) Include srlg values from optical layer
- `include_optical_priority` (String) Set prority for the value
  - Choices: `critical`, `high`, `low`, `verylow`
- `indexes` (Attributes List) Index number for this value (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces--indexes))
- `names` (Attributes List) Bind this SRLG name to the interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces--names))

<a id="nestedatt--interfaces--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces.groups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Group name
- `index_number` (Number) Group index number for this entry
  - Range: `1`-`1`


<a id="nestedatt--interfaces--indexes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces.indexes`

Required:

- `index_number` (Number) Index number for this value
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `priority` (String) Set prority for the value
  - Choices: `critical`, `default`, `high`, `low`, `verylow`
- `value` (Number) Configure SRLG network value
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`


<a id="nestedatt--interfaces--names"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces.names`

Required:

- `srlg_name` (String) Bind this SRLG name to the interface



<a id="nestedatt--names"></a>
### Nested Schema for `names`

Required:

- `srlg_name` (String) SRLG name to value mapping

Optional:

- `description` (String) Configure SRLG network value
- `value` (Number) Configure SRLG network value
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_srlg.example ""
```
